Articles.Content: I'm asking for a sub forum on fan works that says "KSP stories" as they go into mission reports and they are not relevant there

A fan-fiction story sub-forum?  Hmmm......
Well, I'll be the first to admit Emiko Station stopped being just a standard mission report months ago. 

This might not be a bad idea.
Does it not simply become fan works at that point?

It does

The Fan Works forum was made for this sort of thing (and artwork, videos, paintings, etcetera)

39 minutes ago, Deddly said:

Does it not simply become fan works at that point?

I believe what the OP is suggesting is splitting the mission report section into 2 separate parts. 
One section where you do a mission report totally within the game, with no additional content.  Like completing an Elcano challenge or something to that effect. 
The other section would be a fiction based section, for stories like mine, where I've added a bunch of characters and situations (and brain-pods...lol) not normally seen in the game itself.
